analysis.summary: This repository is a focused product-facing todo application built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, leveraging Redux Toolkit for state management and localStorage for client-side persistence. It supports rapid UI iteration and is structured for quick interview-driven feedback cycles rather than complex multi-module functionality.

directions.title: Clarify Onboarding Experience
directions.reason: Users may struggle initially without clear guidance or orientation, especially in a multi-route or configurable app environment.
directions.interviewFocus: Explore users' expectations on first use and identify missing information that would help them start using the product more confidently.

directions.title: Optimize Primary Task Flow
directions.reason: Core user tasks should be streamlined to reduce friction and improve efficiency, as repeated small delays impact overall satisfaction.
directions.interviewFocus: Investigate points where users hesitate or perform extra steps during their most frequent actions to identify bottlenecks.

directions.title: Enhance Feedback and Confirmation
directions.reason: Users need clear, immediate feedback on data changes to build trust and reduce uncertainty about whether actions succeeded.
directions.interviewFocus: Ask which interactions feel ambiguous or unreliable and what types of feedback would increase user confidence in the system.

directions.title: Refine Domain-Specific Workflow
directions.reason: The todo domain suggests specific task sequences that could be tightened to improve flow and reduce cognitive load.
directions.interviewFocus: Understand how users complete key domain tasks and identify any missing steps or awkward handoffs that disrupt flow.
